name: end-to-end
description: Dependencies for running tests with webdriverio and browserstack

scripts.test-webdriver-manager: rm -rf screenshots/diff/; cd .. && ./scripts/env_vars.sh && eval "$(./scripts/env_vars.sh)" && cd end-to-end-tests && (wdio wdio/webdriver-manager.conf.js || bash image-compare/upload_failed_screenshots.sh)
